name: Bob Block Drop
description:
Bob Block Drop is my submission for the "PIXEL JAM 2", with the theme of "FALLING". The game is a 2D, retro style game where you help Bob Block  fall and bounce through 4 levels without hitting the spikes.  The game was made with both Android and PC in mind, and both works great. For the web browser version, you may need to press fullscreen to see the whole screen. Enjoy!

Control:

Press and hold left side of screen to go left and vice versa.
